title: 1967 Crew Cab windows and fuel tank

posts.content:
Hi guys, I need to source replacement rear window surrounds as mine are completely rusty. Are these the same size as the full windowed buses or are they specific to the double cab? Any idea the best place to source these parts?

Also I need to replace the fuel talk and have seen various threads/sites about which is best. Does anyone recommend one at all?

Thanks

Ryan
Pop out windows are the same, I got some repo ones in California, so that probably doesn't help
